title: July Actual Expenses and August Proposed Budget
body:
# Summary

This proposal covers accrued expenses for July as well as a proposed budget for August.

# Expense Categories

-   **Contributor payments**: payments to staff and contributor teams including staff, product, marketing, editorial, treasury, membership, and governance.

-   **Admin expenses**: Admin expenses such as payments for Notion, Zapier, Airtable, Zoom, and Gmail.

-   **Events**: Events such as FWB coffee time, FWB health time, food with beverage, Seed Club event, FWB radio time, FWB stonks.

# July Actual Expenses

### Overall Expenses

| **Category** | **FWB** | **USDC** | **Total USD** |
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
| Contributor Payments | 2,923 | 37,450 | $76,383 | 
| Admin Expenses | 0 | 253 | $253 |
| Events | 400 | 48,182 | $53,510 |
| **Total** | **3,323** | **85,885** | **$130,146** |

### Contributor Payments

| **Category** | **FWB** | **USDC** | **Total USD** |
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
| Staff | 0 | 7,500 | $7,500 |
| Product | 1,522 | 23,750 | $44,022 |
| Marketing | 50 | 1,250 | $1,916 |
| Editorial | 200 | 2,500 | $5,164 |
| Treasury | 50 | 1,200 | $1,866 |
| Membership | 951 | 1,250 | $13,917 |
| Governance | 150 | 0 | $1,998 |
| **Total** | **2,923** | **37,450** | **$76,383** |

Note that most of the event expenses are from FWB’s Paris events. These have been paid already.

# August Proposed Budget

### Overall Budget

| **Category** | **FWB** | **USDC** | **Total USD** |
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
| Contributor Payments | 1,450 | 30,700 | $50,014 |
| Admin Expenses | 0 | 253 | $253 |
| Events | 400 | 0 | $5,328 |
| **Total** | **1,850** | **30,953** | **$55,595** |

### Contributor Budget

| **Category** | **FWB** | **USDC** | **Total USD** |
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
| Staff | 0 | 7,500 | $7,500 |
| Product | 300 | 17,000 | $20,996 |
| Marketing | 50 | 1,250 | $1,916 |
| Editorial | 750 | 2,500 | $12,490 |
| Treasury | 50 | 1,200 | $1,866 |
| Membership | 150 | 1,250 | $3,248 |
| Governance | 150 | 0 | $1,998 |
| **Total** | **1,450** | **30,700** | **$50,014** |

# Prepared by Llama

This budget is prepared by Llama, who works on treasury management for DAOs. We are active FWB members ourselves and work in close collaboration with other community members to draft this budget.

# Conclusion

July’s actual expenses add up to 3,323 FWB and 85,885 USDC. According to FWB's price as of July 28, this is $130,146. Note that expenses from FWB’s events in Paris have been paid for already.

August’s proposed budget adds up to 1,850 FWB and 30,953 USDC. According to FWB's price as of July 28, this is $55,595.

# Vote

Yes - Distribute July actual expenses and approve August budget
No - Do not distribute July actual expenses and do not approve August budget
author: 0x10D6d2e343281D388291A3e02f3293AaEdA67178
